### Setup

```{r set_libs}
library(igraph)
library(GGally)
library(sna)
library(ergm)
```

### netlm

```{r netlm}
set.seed(123)
x<-rgraph(20,4)

g <- graph_from_adjacency_matrix(x[1,,])
plot(g)
```

### Create a response structure

```{r response}

y<-x[1,,]+4*x[2,,]+2*x[3,,]
```

### Fit ntlm model

```{r fit_ntlm}

nl<-netlm(y,x,reps=250)
nl
summary(nl)
```

### ERGM

```{r ergm}
e <- ergm(x[1,,] ~ edges)

print(summary(e))
```
